# Request data frame
modality = Modality()

df = modality.events_data_frame(
    workspace_version_id='${workspace_version_id}',
    segments=[${segments}],
    timeline_filter='_.timeline.id = ${timeline_id}',
    event_filter='_.name = "${event_name}"',
    include_attrs=['event.timestamp'])

df['timestamp_delta'] = df['event.timestamp'].diff()
df['timestamp_delta_sec'] = df['timestamp_delta'].dt.total_seconds()

# Bar chart
fig = px.bar(df, x='event.timestamp', y='timestamp_delta_sec')
fig.update_layout(title='Event Timing Difference: ${event_name} @ ${timeline_name}')
fig.update_xaxes(title_text='event.timestamp')
fig.update_yaxes(title_text='Difference (seconds)', secondary_y=False)
fig.show()

# Histogram
fig = px.histogram(df, x='timestamp_delta_sec')
fig.update_layout(title='Event Timing Difference Histogram: ${event_name} @ ${timeline_name}')
fig.update_xaxes(title_text='Difference (seconds)')
fig.update_yaxes(title_text='', secondary_y=False)
fig.show()

# Box plot
fig = px.box(df, y='timestamp_delta_sec')
fig.update_layout(title='Event Timing Difference Box Plot: ${event_name} @ ${timeline_name}')
fig.update_xaxes(title_text='')
fig.update_yaxes(title_text='Difference (seconds)', secondary_y=False)
fig.show()
